data.name: Waveriding Whirl
data.passiveDescription: Decreases Swimming Stamina consumption by 15%. In addition, for 10s after using an Elemental Skill, Max HP is increased by {{20//25//30//35//40%}}. For every Hydro Elemental Type character in the party, Max HP is increased by another {{12//15//18//21//24%}}, and the maximum increase that can be achieved in this way is {{24//30//36//42//48%}}. Can be triggered once every 15s.
